summary: Allows you to run and sprint with 2-Handed Weapons in your right hand, 2H Axes, 2H Swords and Warhammers
descriptionHtml:
Credit goes to:

HexEddie:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2965

Tomolyons:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5677

I combined their ideas into one package and added fixes needed for 2H Axes.
(Mostly a simple file switch, rename swap.)

Replaced the following files:
2hm_runbackward (Affects all 2H to 1H carry anims)
2hm_runbackwardleft (")
2hm_runbackwardright (")
2hm_runforward (")
2hm_runforwardleft (")
2hm_runfowardright (")
2hm_runleft (")
2hm_runright (")
2hm_runstraferight (")
2hm_shout_exhale (")
2hm_shout_exhale_medium (")
2hm_shoul_exhale_long (")
2hm_shout_inhale (")
2hm_runsprintforwardsword (2H > 1H carry sword)
2hw_runarmblend (2H > 1H carry axes/hammers)
2hw_runsprintforwardsword (2H > 1H carry axes/hammers)
author: cat_woman1989
